mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM user_role ur INNER JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON srm.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN sys_menu sm on sm.menu_id = srm.menu_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} group by sm.menu_id

SELECT
FROM sys_menu sm WHERE sm.is_deleted = 'N'
AND sm.parent_id = #{parentId}
AND sm.parent_id is null

SELECT
FROM sys_menu sm WHERE sm.is_deleted = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET level = '1' , url = #{url} , name = #{name} , parent_id = #{parentId} , sort = #{sort} , disable = #{disable} , is_deleted = #{isDeleted} , gmt_modify = NOW() , img = #{img} WHERE menu_id = ${menuId}
mapper.delete: UPDATE sys_menu SET is_deleted = 'Y' WHERE menu_id = ${menuId}
